review:
She is very kind and professional.I had a great experience with her.
When thinking about consulting a dental doctor,i usually have many doubts and confusions.But after having a consultation with her,I felt really free to communicate about my dental stuffs.

Dr. Akshaya is nothing less than an excellent dentist especially with kids. We have tried with 3-4doctors for my daughter s dental treatment and nobody has been so convincing and patient with her. We totally recommend her. She explains everything very well before the procedure is done.

I took my son to Dr Akshaya for his tooth pain. I was extremely worried as it was his first experience. I searched a lot for a good pediatric dentist and my friend suggested Dr Akshaya. I really recommend her to all the mothers who are like me. The treatment went really easy and she puts a lot of time for each kid. The clinic is also a good set . Really happy
Highly satisfied with the service provided.Recommending her to other parents as well who is looking for good paediatric dental doctor .

My sons tongue tie correction was done by Dr Akshaya. She had done a laser procedure. I was painless a bloodless. I would recommend Dr Akshaya to everyone.  Her behaviour with kids is very good and she is very friendly with everyone.
